edu.ncsu.dre
Class DREConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  edu.ncsu.dre.DREConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultDREConfiguration
public class DREConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

This class specifies the configuration of the Distributed Research Engine and its components.
In order to use a framework instance one has use the setDREConfiguration() method to set the components. If attempted to use DREFramework without specifying a valid configuration the DREIllegalStateException will be thrown.

Author:
Santthosh Babu Selvadurai

setSegregator

public void setSegregator(Segregator segregator)
Sets this configuration with the given Segregator. Developers can use the default LexicalSegregator for text searches, extend it or create their own Segregator by implementing Segregator interface.

Parameters:
segregator - the segregator to set
